00032 /* User-Interface Stuff for F-Modifiers:
00033  * This file defines the (C-Coded) templates + editing callbacks needed 
00034  * by the interface stuff or F-Modifiers, as used by F-Curves in the Graph Editor,
00035  * and NLA-Strips in the NLA Editor.
00036  *
00037  * Copy/Paste Buffer for F-Modifiers:
00038  * For now, this is also defined in this file so that it can be shared between the 
00039  */
00040

00070 // XXX! --------------------------------
00071 /* temporary definition for limits of float number buttons (FLT_MAX tends to infinity with old system) */
00072 #define UI_FLT_MAX  10000.0f
00073 
00074 #define B_REDR                  1
00075 #define B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW      20
00076 
00077 /* macro for use here to draw background box and set height */
00078 // XXX for now, roundbox has it's callback func set to NULL to not intercept events
00079 #define DRAW_BACKDROP(height) \
00080     { \
00081         uiDefBut(block, ROUNDBOX, B_REDR, "", -3, yco-height, width+3, height-1, NULL, 5.0, 0.0, 12.0, (float)rb_col, ""); \
00082     }

00084 /* callback to verify modifier data */
00085 static void validate_fmodifier_cb (bContext *UNUSED(C), void *fcm_v, void *UNUSED(arg))
00086 {
00087     FModifier *fcm= (FModifier *)fcm_v;
00088     FModifierTypeInfo *fmi= fmodifier_get_typeinfo(fcm);
00089     
00090     /* call the verify callback on the modifier if applicable */
00091     if (fmi && fmi->verify_data)
00092         fmi->verify_data(fcm);
00093 }
00094 
00095 /* callback to remove the given modifier  */
00096 static void delete_fmodifier_cb (bContext *C, void *fmods_v, void *fcm_v)
00097 {
00098     ListBase *modifiers = (ListBase *)fmods_v;
00099     FModifier *fcm= (FModifier *)fcm_v;
00100     
00101     /* remove the given F-Modifier from the active modifier-stack */
00102     remove_fmodifier(modifiers, fcm);
00103 
00104     ED_undo_push(C, "Delete F-Curve Modifier");
00105     
00106     /* send notifiers */
00107     // XXX for now, this is the only way to get updates in all the right places... but would be nice to have a special one in this case 
00108     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_ANIMATION|ND_KEYFRAME|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00109 }

00113 /* draw settings for generator modifier */
00114 static void draw_modifier__generator(uiLayout *layout, ID *id, FModifier *fcm, short width)
00115 {
00116     FMod_Generator *data= (FMod_Generator *)fcm->data;
00117     uiLayout /* *col, */ /* UNUSED */ *row;
00118     uiBlock *block;
00119     uiBut *but;
00120     PointerRNA ptr;
00121     
00122     /* init the RNA-pointer */
00123     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_FModifierFunctionGenerator, fcm, &ptr);
00124     
00125     /* basic settings (backdrop + mode selector + some padding) */
00126     /* col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1); */ /* UNUSED */
00127     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00128     uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00129         but = uiDefButR(block, MENU, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, NULL, 0, 0, width-30, UI_UNIT_Y, &ptr, "mode", -1, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00130         uiButSetFunc(but, validate_fmodifier_cb, fcm, NULL);
00131         
00132         uiDefButR(block, TOG, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, NULL, 0, 0, width-30, UI_UNIT_Y, &ptr, "use_additive", -1, 0, 0, -1, -1, NULL);
00133     uiBlockEndAlign(block);
00134     
00135     /* now add settings for individual modes */
00136     switch (data->mode) {
00137         case FCM_GENERATOR_POLYNOMIAL: /* polynomial expression */
00138         {
00139             float *cp = NULL;
00140             char xval[32];
00141             unsigned int i;
00142             
00143             /* draw polynomial order selector */
00144             row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00145             block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00146                 but = uiDefButI(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, IFACE_("Poly Order:"), 10, 0, width-30, 19,
00147                                &data->poly_order, 1, 100, 0, 0,
00148                                TIP_("'Order' of the Polynomial (for a polynomial with n terms, 'order' is n-1)"));
00149                 uiButSetFunc(but, validate_fmodifier_cb, fcm, NULL);
00150             
00151             
00152             /* draw controls for each coefficient and a + sign at end of row */
00153             row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00154             block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00155             
00156             cp= data->coefficients;
00157             for (i=0; (i < data->arraysize) && (cp); i++, cp++) {
00158                 /* To align with first line */
00159                 if (i)
00160                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "   ", 0, 0, 50, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00161                 else
00162                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "y =", 0, 0, 50, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00163                 /* coefficient */
00164                 uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, "", 0, 0, 150, 20, cp, -UI_FLT_MAX, UI_FLT_MAX,
00165                           10, 3, TIP_("Coefficient for polynomial"));
00166                 
00167                 /* 'x' param (and '+' if necessary) */
00168                 if (i == 0)
00169                     strcpy(xval, "");
00170                 else if (i == 1)
00171                     strcpy(xval, "x");
00172                 else
00173                     sprintf(xval, "x^%u", i);
00174                 uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, xval, 0, 0, 50, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, TIP_("Power of x"));
00175                 
00176                 if ( (i != (data->arraysize - 1)) || ((i==0) && data->arraysize==2) ) {
00177                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "+", 0, 0, 30, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00178                     
00179                     /* next coefficient on a new row */
00180                     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00181                     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00182                 }
00183                 else {
00184                     /* For alignement in UI! */
00185                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, " ", 0, 0, 30, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00186                 }
00187             }
00188             break;
00189         }
00190         
00191         case FCM_GENERATOR_POLYNOMIAL_FACTORISED: /* Factorized polynomial expression */
00192         {
00193             float *cp = NULL;
00194             unsigned int i;
00195             
00196             /* draw polynomial order selector */
00197             row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00198             block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00199                 but = uiDefButI(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, IFACE_("Poly Order:"), 0, 0, width-30, 19,
00200                                &data->poly_order, 1, 100, 0, 0,
00201                                TIP_("'Order' of the Polynomial (for a polynomial with n terms, 'order' is n-1)"));
00202                 uiButSetFunc(but, validate_fmodifier_cb, fcm, NULL);
00203             
00204             
00205             /* draw controls for each pair of coefficients */
00206             row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00207             block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00208             
00209             cp= data->coefficients;
00210             for (i=0; (i < data->poly_order) && (cp); i++, cp+=2) {
00211                 /* To align with first line */
00212                 if (i)
00213                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "   ", 0, 0, 50, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00214                 else
00215                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "y =", 0, 0, 50, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00216                 /* opening bracket */
00217                 uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "(", 0, 0, 20, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00218                 
00219                 /* coefficients */
00220                 uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, "", 0, 0, 100, 20, cp, -UI_FLT_MAX, UI_FLT_MAX,
00221                           10, 3, TIP_("Coefficient of x"));
00222                 
00223                 uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, "x +", 0, 0, 40, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00224                 
00225                 uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, "", 0, 0, 100, 20, cp+1, -UI_FLT_MAX, UI_FLT_MAX,
00226                           10, 3, TIP_("Second coefficient"));
00227                 
00228                 /* closing bracket and '+' sign */
00229                 if ( (i != (data->poly_order - 1)) || ((i==0) && data->poly_order==2) ) {
00230                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, ") +", 0, 0, 30, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00231                     
00232                     /* set up new row for the next pair of coefficients*/
00233                     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00234                     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00235                 }
00236                 else 
00237                     uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, ")", 0, 0, 20, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00238             }
00239         }
00240             break;
00241     }
00242 }

00246 /* draw settings for generator modifier */
00247 static void draw_modifier__fn_generator(uiLayout *layout, ID *id, FModifier *fcm, short UNUSED(width))
00248 {
00249     uiLayout *col;
00250     PointerRNA ptr;
00251     
00252     /* init the RNA-pointer */
00253     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_FModifierFunctionGenerator, fcm, &ptr);
00254     
00255     /* add the settings */
00256     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00257         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "function_type", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00258         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "use_additive", UI_ITEM_R_TOGGLE, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00259     
00260     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0); // no grouping for now
00261         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "amplitude", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00262         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "phase_multiplier", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00263         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "phase_offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00264         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "value_offset", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00265 }

00269 /* draw settings for cycles modifier */
00270 static void draw_modifier__cycles(uiLayout *layout, ID *id, FModifier *fcm, short UNUSED(width))
00271 {
00272     uiLayout *split, *col;
00273     PointerRNA ptr;
00274     
00275     /* init the RNA-pointer */
00276     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_FModifierCycles, fcm, &ptr);
00277     
00278     /* split into 2 columns 
00279      * NOTE: the mode comboboxes shouldn't get labels, otherwise there isn't enough room
00280      */
00281     split= uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.5f, 0);
00282     
00283     /* before range */
00284     col= uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00285         uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Before:"), ICON_NONE);
00286         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "mode_before", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00287         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "cycles_before", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00288         
00289     /* after range */
00290     col= uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00291         uiItemL(col, IFACE_("After:"), ICON_NONE);
00292         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "mode_after", 0, "", ICON_NONE);
00293         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "cycles_after", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00294 }

00324 /* --------------- */
00325 
00326 #define BINARYSEARCH_FRAMEEQ_THRESH 0.0001f
00327 
00328 /* Binary search algorithm for finding where to insert Envelope Data Point.
00329  * Returns the index to insert at (data already at that index will be offset if replace is 0)
00330  */
00331 static int binarysearch_fcm_envelopedata_index (FCM_EnvelopeData array[], float frame, int arraylen, short *exists)
00332 {
00333     int start=0, end=arraylen;
00334     int loopbreaker= 0, maxloop= arraylen * 2;
00335     
00336     /* initialize exists-flag first */
00337     *exists= 0;
00338     
00339     /* sneaky optimisations (don't go through searching process if...):
00340      *  - keyframe to be added is to be added out of current bounds
00341      *  - keyframe to be added would replace one of the existing ones on bounds
00342      */
00343     if ((arraylen <= 0) || (array == NULL)) {
00344         printf("Warning: binarysearch_fcm_envelopedata_index() encountered invalid array\n");
00345         return 0;
00346     }
00347     else {
00348         /* check whether to add before/after/on */
00349         float framenum;
00350         
00351         /* 'First' Point (when only one point, this case is used) */
00352         framenum= array[0].time;
00353         if (IS_EQT(frame, framenum, BINARYSEARCH_FRAMEEQ_THRESH)) {
00354             *exists = 1;
00355             return 0;
00356         }
00357         else if (frame < framenum)
00358             return 0;
00359             
00360         /* 'Last' Point */
00361         framenum= array[(arraylen-1)].time;
00362         if (IS_EQT(frame, framenum, BINARYSEARCH_FRAMEEQ_THRESH)) {
00363             *exists= 1;
00364             return (arraylen - 1);
00365         }
00366         else if (frame > framenum)
00367             return arraylen;
00368     }
00369     
00370     
00371     /* most of the time, this loop is just to find where to put it
00372      *  - 'loopbreaker' is just here to prevent infinite loops 
00373      */
00374     for (loopbreaker=0; (start <= end) && (loopbreaker < maxloop); loopbreaker++) {
00375         /* compute and get midpoint */
00376         int mid = start + ((end - start) / 2);  /* we calculate the midpoint this way to avoid int overflows... */
00377         float midfra= array[mid].time;
00378         
00379         /* check if exactly equal to midpoint */
00380         if (IS_EQT(frame, midfra, BINARYSEARCH_FRAMEEQ_THRESH)) {
00381             *exists = 1;
00382             return mid;
00383         }
00384         
00385         /* repeat in upper/lower half */
00386         if (frame > midfra)
00387             start= mid + 1;
00388         else if (frame < midfra)
00389             end= mid - 1;
00390     }
00391     
00392     /* print error if loop-limit exceeded */
00393     if (loopbreaker == (maxloop-1)) {
00394         printf("Error: binarysearch_fcm_envelopedata_index() was taking too long\n");
00395         
00396         // include debug info 
00397         printf("\tround = %d: start = %d, end = %d, arraylen = %d\n", loopbreaker, start, end, arraylen);
00398     }
00399     
00400     /* not found, so return where to place it */
00401     return start;
00402 }
00403 
00404 /* callback to add new envelope data point */
00405 // TODO: should we have a separate file for things like this?
00406 static void fmod_envelope_addpoint_cb (bContext *C, void *fcm_dv, void *UNUSED(arg))
00407 {
00408     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00409     FMod_Envelope *env= (FMod_Envelope *)fcm_dv;
00410     FCM_EnvelopeData *fedn;
00411     FCM_EnvelopeData fed;
00412     
00413     /* init template data */
00414     fed.min= -1.0f;
00415     fed.max= 1.0f;
00416     fed.time= (float)scene->r.cfra; // XXX make this int for ease of use?
00417     fed.f1= fed.f2= 0;
00418     
00419     /* check that no data exists for the current frame... */
00420     if (env->data) {
00421         short exists = -1;
00422         int i= binarysearch_fcm_envelopedata_index(env->data, (float)(scene->r.cfra), env->totvert, &exists);
00423         
00424         /* binarysearch_...() will set exists by default to 0, so if it is non-zero, that means that the point exists already */
00425         if (exists)
00426             return;
00427             
00428         /* add new */
00429         fedn= MEM_callocN((env->totvert+1)*sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData), "FCM_EnvelopeData");
00430         
00431         /* add the points that should occur before the point to be pasted */
00432         if (i > 0)
00433             memcpy(fedn, env->data, i*sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData));
00434         
00435         /* add point to paste at index i */
00436         *(fedn + i)= fed;
00437         
00438         /* add the points that occur after the point to be pasted */
00439         if (i < env->totvert) 
00440             memcpy(fedn+i+1, env->data+i, (env->totvert-i)*sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData));
00441         
00442         /* replace (+ free) old with new */
00443         MEM_freeN(env->data);
00444         env->data= fedn;
00445         
00446         env->totvert++;
00447     }
00448     else {
00449         env->data= MEM_callocN(sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData), "FCM_EnvelopeData");
00450         *(env->data)= fed;
00451         
00452         env->totvert= 1;
00453     }
00454 }
00455 
00456 /* callback to remove envelope data point */
00457 // TODO: should we have a separate file for things like this?
00458 static void fmod_envelope_deletepoint_cb (bContext *UNUSED(C), void *fcm_dv, void *ind_v)
00459 {
00460     FMod_Envelope *env= (FMod_Envelope *)fcm_dv;
00461     FCM_EnvelopeData *fedn;
00462     int index= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(ind_v);
00463     
00464     /* check that no data exists for the current frame... */
00465     if (env->totvert > 1) {
00466         /* allocate a new smaller array */
00467         fedn= MEM_callocN(sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData)*(env->totvert-1), "FCM_EnvelopeData");
00468 
00469         memcpy(fedn, env->data, sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData)*(index));
00470         memcpy(fedn + index, env->data + (index + 1), sizeof(FCM_EnvelopeData)*((env->totvert - index)-1));
00471         
00472         /* free old array, and set the new */
00473         MEM_freeN(env->data);
00474         env->data= fedn;
00475         env->totvert--;
00476     }
00477     else {
00478         /* just free array, since the only vert was deleted */
00479         if (env->data) {
00480             MEM_freeN(env->data);
00481             env->data= NULL;
00482         }
00483         env->totvert= 0;
00484     }
00485 }
00486 
00487 /* draw settings for envelope modifier */
00488 static void draw_modifier__envelope(uiLayout *layout, ID *id, FModifier *fcm, short UNUSED(width))
00489 {
00490     FMod_Envelope *env= (FMod_Envelope *)fcm->data;
00491     FCM_EnvelopeData *fed;
00492     uiLayout *col, *row;
00493     uiBlock *block;
00494     uiBut *but;
00495     PointerRNA ptr;
00496     int i;
00497     
00498     /* init the RNA-pointer */
00499     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_FModifierEnvelope, fcm, &ptr);
00500     
00501     /* general settings */
00502     col= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 1);
00503         uiItemL(col, IFACE_("Envelope:"), ICON_NONE);
00504         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "reference_value", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00505         
00506         row= uiLayoutRow(col, 1);
00507             uiItemR(row, &ptr, "default_min", 0, IFACE_("Min"), ICON_NONE);
00508             uiItemR(row, &ptr, "default_max", 0, IFACE_("Max"), ICON_NONE);
00509             
00510     /* control points header */
00511     // TODO: move this control-point control stuff to using the new special widgets for lists
00512     // the current way is far too cramped
00513     row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0);
00514     block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00515         
00516         uiDefBut(block, LABEL, 1, IFACE_("Control Points:"), 0, 0, 150, 20, NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0, 0, "");
00517         
00518         but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, IFACE_("Add Point"), 0, 0, 150, 19,
00519                       NULL, 0, 0, 0, 0, TIP_("Add a new control-point to the envelope on the current frame"));
00520         uiButSetFunc(but, fmod_envelope_addpoint_cb, env, NULL);
00521         
00522     /* control points list */
00523     for (i=0, fed=env->data; i < env->totvert; i++, fed++) {
00524         /* get a new row to operate on */
00525         row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 1);
00526         block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row);
00527         
00528         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00529             but=uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, IFACE_("Fra:"), 0, 0, 90, 20,
00530                           &fed->time, -MAXFRAMEF, MAXFRAMEF, 10, 1, TIP_("Frame that envelope point occurs"));
00531             uiButSetFunc(but, validate_fmodifier_cb, fcm, NULL);
00532             
00533             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, IFACE_("Min:"), 0, 0, 100, 20,
00534                       &fed->min, -UI_FLT_MAX, UI_FLT_MAX, 10, 2, TIP_("Minimum bound of envelope at this point"));
00535             uiDefButF(block, NUM, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, IFACE_("Max:"), 0, 0, 100, 20,
00536                       &fed->max, -UI_FLT_MAX, UI_FLT_MAX, 10, 2, TIP_("Maximum bound of envelope at this point"));
00537             
00538             but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_FMODIFIER_REDRAW, ICON_X, 0, 0, 18, 20,
00539                               NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, TIP_("Delete envelope control point"));
00540             uiButSetFunc(but, fmod_envelope_deletepoint_cb, env, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
00541         uiBlockBeginAlign(block);
00542     }
00543 }

00547 /* draw settings for limits modifier */

00549 {

00556     /* row 1: minimum */
00557     {
00558         /* row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0); */ /* UNUSED */
00559         
00560         /* split into 2 columns */
00561         split= uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.5f, 0);
00562         
00563         /* x-minimum */
00564         col= uiLayoutColumn(split, 1);
00565             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "use_min_x", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00566             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "min_x", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00567             
00568         /* y-minimum*/

00570             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "use_min_y", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00571             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "min_y", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00572     }
00573     
00574     /* row 2: maximum */
00575     {
00576         /* row= uiLayoutRow(layout, 0); */ /* UNUSED */
00577         
00578         /* split into 2 columns */
00579         split= uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.5f, 0);
00580         
00581         /* x-minimum */

00589             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "max_y", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00590     }

00595 /* draw settings for stepped interpolation modifier */

00608         
00609     /* block 2: start range settings */

00612

00615             uiItemR(sub, &ptr, "frame_start", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00616

00619         uiItemR(col, &ptr, "use_frame_end", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00620         
00621         sub = uiLayoutColumn(col, 1);
00622         uiLayoutSetActive(sub, RNA_boolean_get(&ptr, "use_frame_end"));
00623             uiItemR(sub, &ptr, "frame_end", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00624 }

00626 /* --------------- */
00627 
00628 void ANIM_uiTemplate_fmodifier_draw (uiLayout *layout, ID *id, ListBase *modifiers, FModifier *fcm)
00629 {
00630     FModifierTypeInfo *fmi= fmodifier_get_typeinfo(fcm);
00631     uiLayout *box, *row, *sub, *col;
00632     uiBlock *block;
00633     uiBut *but;
00634     short width= 314;
00635     PointerRNA ptr;
00636     
00637     /* init the RNA-pointer */
00638     RNA_pointer_create(id, &RNA_FModifier, fcm, &ptr);
00639     
00640     /* draw header */
00641     {
00642         /* get layout-row + UI-block for this */
00643         box= uiLayoutBox(layout);
00644         
00645         row= uiLayoutRow(box, 0);
00646         block= uiLayoutGetBlock(row); // err...
00647         
00648         /* left-align -------------------------------------------- */
00649         sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
00650         uiLayoutSetAlignment(sub, UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_LEFT);
00651         
00652         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
00653         
00654         /* expand */
00655         uiItemR(sub, &ptr, "show_expanded", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00656         
00657         /* checkbox for 'active' status (for now) */
00658         uiItemR(sub, &ptr, "active", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00659         
00660         /* name */
00661         if (fmi)
00662             uiItemL(sub, fmi->name, ICON_NONE);
00663         else
00664             uiItemL(sub, "<Unknown Modifier>", ICON_NONE);
00665         
00666         /* right-align ------------------------------------------- */
00667         sub= uiLayoutRow(row, 1);
00668         uiLayoutSetAlignment(sub, UI_LAYOUT_ALIGN_RIGHT);
00669         
00670         
00671         /* 'mute' button */
00672         uiItemR(sub, &ptr, "mute", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", ICON_NONE);
00673         
00674         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
00675         
00676         /* delete button */
00677         but = uiDefIconBut(block, BUT, B_REDR, ICON_X, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y,
00678                           NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, TIP_("Delete F-Curve Modifier"));
00679         uiButSetFunc(but, delete_fmodifier_cb, modifiers, fcm);
00680         
00681         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
00682     }
00683     
00684     /* when modifier is expanded, draw settings */
00685     if (fcm->flag & FMODIFIER_FLAG_EXPANDED) {
00686         /* set up the flexible-box layout which acts as the backdrop for the modifier settings */
00687         box= uiLayoutBox(layout); 
00688         
00689         /* draw settings for individual modifiers */
00690         switch (fcm->type) {
00691             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_GENERATOR: /* Generator */
00692                 draw_modifier__generator(box, id, fcm, width);
00693                 break;
00694                 
00695             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_FN_GENERATOR: /* Built-In Function Generator */
00696                 draw_modifier__fn_generator(box, id, fcm, width);
00697                 break;
00698                 
00699             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_CYCLES: /* Cycles */
00700                 draw_modifier__cycles(box, id, fcm, width);
00701                 break;
00702                 
00703             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_ENVELOPE: /* Envelope */
00704                 draw_modifier__envelope(box, id, fcm, width);
00705                 break;
00706                 
00707             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_LIMITS: /* Limits */
00708                 draw_modifier__limits(box, id, fcm, width);
00709                 break;
00710             
00711             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_NOISE: /* Noise */
00712                 draw_modifier__noise(box, id, fcm, width);
00713                 break;
00714                 
00715             case FMODIFIER_TYPE_STEPPED: /* Stepped */
00716                 draw_modifier__stepped(box, id, fcm, width);
00717                 break;
00718             
00719             default: /* unknown type */
00720                 break;
00721         }
00722         
00723         /* one last panel below this: FModifier range */
00724         // TODO: experiment with placement of this
00725         {
00726             box = uiLayoutBox(layout);
00727             
00728             /* restricted range ----------------------------------------------------- */
00729             col = uiLayoutColumn(box, 1);
00730             
00731             /* top row: use restricted range */
00732             row= uiLayoutRow(col, 1);
00733             uiItemR(row, &ptr, "use_restricted_range", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00734             
00735             if (fcm->flag & FMODIFIER_FLAG_RANGERESTRICT) {
00736                 /* second row: settings */
00737                 row = uiLayoutRow(col, 1);
00738                 
00739                 uiItemR(row, &ptr, "frame_start", 0, IFACE_("Start"), ICON_NONE);
00740                 uiItemR(row, &ptr, "frame_end", 0, IFACE_("End"), ICON_NONE);
00741                 
00742                 /* third row: blending influence */
00743                 row = uiLayoutRow(col, 1);
00744                 
00745                 uiItemR(row, &ptr, "blend_in", 0, IFACE_("In"), ICON_NONE);
00746                 uiItemR(row, &ptr, "blend_out", 0, IFACE_("Out"), ICON_NONE);
00747             }
00748             
00749             /* influence -------------------------------------------------------------- */
00750             col = uiLayoutColumn(box, 1);
00751             
00752             /* top row: use influence */
00753             uiItemR(col, &ptr, "use_influence", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00754             
00755             if (fcm->flag & FMODIFIER_FLAG_USEINFLUENCE) {
00756                 /* second row: influence value */
00757                 uiItemR(col, &ptr, "influence", 0, NULL, ICON_NONE);
00758             }
00759         }
00760     }
00761 }
00762 
00763 /* ********************************************** */
00764 /* COPY/PASTE BUFFER STUFF */
00765 
00766 /* Copy/Paste Buffer itself (list of FModifier 's) */
00767 static ListBase fmodifier_copypaste_buf = {NULL, NULL};
00768 
00769 /* ---------- */
00770 
00771 /* free the copy/paste buffer */
00772 void free_fmodifiers_copybuf (void)
00773 {
00774     /* just free the whole buffer */
00775     free_fmodifiers(&fmodifier_copypaste_buf);
00776 }
00777 
00778 /* copy the given F-Modifiers to the buffer, returning whether anything was copied or not
00779  * assuming that the buffer has been cleared already with free_fmodifiers_copybuf()
00780  *  - active: only copy the active modifier
00781  */
00782 short ANIM_fmodifiers_copy_to_buf (ListBase *modifiers, short active)
00783 {
00784     short ok = 1;
00785     
00786     /* sanity checks */
00787     if (ELEM(NULL, modifiers, modifiers->first))
00788         return 0;
00789         
00790     /* copy the whole list, or just the active one? */
00791     if (active) {
00792         FModifier *fcm = find_active_fmodifier(modifiers);
00793         
00794         if (fcm) {
00795             FModifier *fcmN = copy_fmodifier(fcm);
00796             BLI_addtail(&fmodifier_copypaste_buf, fcmN);
00797         }
00798         else
00799             ok = 0;
00800     }
00801     else
00802         copy_fmodifiers(&fmodifier_copypaste_buf, modifiers);
00803         
00804     /* did we succeed? */
00805     return ok;
00806 }
00807 
00808 /* 'Paste' the F-Modifier(s) from the buffer to the specified list 
00809  *  - replace: free all the existing modifiers to leave only the pasted ones 
00810  */
00811 short ANIM_fmodifiers_paste_from_buf (ListBase *modifiers, short replace)
00812 {
00813     FModifier *fcm;
00814     short ok = 0;
00815     
00816     /* sanity checks */
00817     if (modifiers == NULL)
00818         return 0;
00819         
00820     /* if replacing the list, free the existing modifiers */
00821     if (replace)
00822         free_fmodifiers(modifiers);
00823         
00824     /* now copy over all the modifiers in the buffer to the end of the list */
00825     for (fcm= fmodifier_copypaste_buf.first; fcm; fcm= fcm->next) {
00826         /* make a copy of it */
00827         FModifier *fcmN = copy_fmodifier(fcm);
00828         
00829         /* make sure the new one isn't active, otherwise the list may get several actives */
00830         fcmN->flag &= ~FMODIFIER_FLAG_ACTIVE;
00831         
00832         /* now add it to the end of the list */
00833         BLI_addtail(modifiers, fcmN);
00834         ok = 1;
00835     }
00836     
00837     /* did we succeed? */
00838     return ok;
00839 }
